title: [ie8] upload does not finish till the web is refreshed manually
body:
### expected behaviour
by uploading a file using explorer 8, when the upload finishes the file size should be displayed

### actual behaviour

although the upload finishes, on the size field it is shown: pending and the spinner does not disappear till you refresh manually the web.

### steps to reproduce
1. log in oc using ie8
2. upload any file
3. check that the upload does not finish, the loadin icon is on the screen, till you refresh it.

### server configuration
acceptance-testing, master_on_apache_with_sqlite
[2013-03-12t07:40:48+00:00] info: git[/usr/local/src/owncloud-core] updated to revision 569c7ab1384c9d01255ae7bc2075edf11508d4a6

[2013-03-12t07:41:28+00:00] info: git[/usr/local/src/owncloud-apps] updated to revision 9219b6e1f16b46ecb4fe9c46701232435e4f05e8

### client configuration
browser: ie8

operating system: windows7

### logs
#### web server error log
```
insert your webserver log here
```
